LanguageData.CrudeOil.label: 原油
LanguageData.CrudeOil.description: Crude Oil is extracted from an Oil Fissure through use of an Oil Extractor. It can be refined at a Petrochemical Plant to produce Polymers, Paraffins, Sulfur, Synthetic Ammonia and Fuel Oil.
LanguageData.Polymers.label: 聚合物
LanguageData.Polymers.description: Polymers are a product of refined Crude Oil. It is a useful raw material used in creation of Plastic, Rubber, Synthetic Fibers and Carbon at a Petrochemical Plant.
LanguageData.Plastic.label: 塑料
LanguageData.Plastic.description: Plastic is a useful raw material for building construction or item production or weapons.
LanguageData.Rubber.label: 合成橡胶
LanguageData.Rubber.description: Rubber is useful for a variety of things such as duct pipes, pumps or as a building material supplement/additive.
LanguageData.SyntheticFibers.label: 人造纤维
LanguageData.SyntheticFibers.description: Synthetic Fibers are artifical strands created from Polymers and Sulfur. They can be woven into Synthread Cloth at a Tailor's Workbench, or woven with Carbon into Carbon Fiber Alloy at a Chemical Laboratory.
LanguageData.Carbon.label: 碳
LanguageData.Carbon.description: Carbon is a fiber-reinforced polymer that is an extremely strong and light. It can be reinforced further with Synthetic Fibers to create Carbon Fiber Alloy at a Chemical Laboratory.
LanguageData.SyntheticAmmonia.label: 合成氨
LanguageData.SyntheticAmmonia.description: Synthetic Ammonia is a product of refined Crude Oil. It is useful for fertilizing soil or creating Impaction Charges.
LanguageData.Paraffins.label: 石蜡
LanguageData.Paraffins.description: Paraffins are a product of refined Crude Oil. It is useful in crafting medicines.
LanguageData.Sulfur.label: 硫磺
LanguageData.Sulfur.description: Sulfur occurs naturally as the pure element - native sulfur and as sulfide and sulfate minerals. Sulfur can be obtained from refined Crude Oil at a Petrochemical Plant or from processing Iron Ore at an Ammo Crafting Table. It is useful for Gunpowder in crafting various types of turret ammo.
LanguageData.Sulphates.label: 硫酸盐
